text: Mazaj 95.3 FM is a privately owned radio station located in Amman, Jordan. The station was established in 2005 and is owned by the National Broadcast Company, which was founded by Abu-Lughod Studios and Seagulls Broadcast Ltd. ==Format== The station focuses on giving its audience the latest Arabic pop music as well as popular Arabic hits played throughout the past decades. ==External links== *Official website Category:Radio stations in Jordan Category:Mass media in Amman Category:Radio stations established in 2005
title: Mazaj 95.3 FM
